channel.title: Sleep on chrislindsay.org
channel.description: Recent content in Sleep on chrislindsay.org

item.title: Sleep to Thrive!
item.description: Hi. My name is Chris Lindsay, from Chrislindsay.org. Welcome to this live video. This is the first in a series of videos on helping you to get out of survival mode. What if there was one thing you could do that by spending more time doing each day, you’d help prevent type 2 diabetes and heart disease. You’d feel better physically and emotionally. You’d boost your immune system.
